description:
UPDATE:  With the recent announcement of the discontinuation of the HP TouchPad, HP Care Pack Services are no longer for sale from online stores or the on-device application.  If an HP Care Pack has already been purchased, it will be honored and supported according to its terms.  For those devices without a Care Pack, the Standard warranty will still be provided, which includes 1 year hardware coverage and 90-day telephone support.

HP wants you to get the most out of your webOS device and has created Care Packs that are at low prices and of tremendous value.  Download the Care Pack app to learn about extending your protection and receiving extended telephone support plus accidental damage protection (ADP).  Within the app, choose which HP Care Pack service is right for you, and with one easy step purchase coverage from the company who knows your product best, HP.  Once you’ve made your purchase, check the app periodically for status information about your new HP Care Pack as well as webOS support contact details.
